name: BALLCRAFT AIR HOCKEY
description:
NOW WITH REAL-TIME MULTI-PLAYER

Bring the arcade into the palm of your hand and play air hockey like you have never played before, with your phone as the mallet.

Get into the game and into the action as you tilt to move, twist to pan, and flick to hit.
Swing and hit the puck with perfect timing to send it into the goal but beware the opponent is ready to return the puck at top speed!

As you progress you rise in rank, the puck goes faster and the skills needed increase.

A Distinct AI opponents with 4 levels for a total of 4 unique game opponents, you will find a challenge that requires all your skills to succeed.

Do you have what it takes to master Air Hockey? Play now and see why Ballcraft Air Hockey is the best Air Hockey game ever!
